meanings.definition: Having a quality that is lively and exciting.
meanings.sent1: The party was zingier than I expected.
meanings.sent2: The music at the concert was much zingier than the music at the cafe.
meanings.sent3: The zingier decorations made the room feel more festive.
meanings.sent4: Her zingier personality lit up the room like a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The zingier colors of the painting made it stand out among the others.

meanings.definition: More lively and exciting than something else.
meanings.sent1: The new movie was zingier than the one we watched last week.
meanings.sent2: The zingier dance routine captivated the audience's attention.
meanings.sent3: The zingier flavors of the dish surprised and delighted our taste buds.
meanings.sent4: Her zingier outfit outshone all the others at the party.
meanings.sent5: The zingier performance left the crowd cheering for more.
